data.prayer: Lord, please give the 13,430 believers in the county of Nabarangapur the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nabarangapur, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,220,900 citizens of Nabarangapur, Odisha, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Nabarangapur. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Nabarangapur, Odisha, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Gond Dorla people.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 13,430 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, help the 13,430 believers in Nabarangapur to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.section_summary:
the county of Nabarangapur, Odisha, India has a population of 1,220,900.

We estimate Nabarangapur has 13,430 people who might know Jesus, 14,814 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,192,657 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Nabarangapur, Odisha, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.
